com.btmatthews.ldapunit

Class TestDirectoryServerRuleMethodConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.ldapunit.TestDirectoryServerRuleMethodConfiguration

  • public class TestDirectoryServerRuleMethodConfiguration
extends Object
    Unit test the DirectoryServerRule rule when the methods are annotated with DirectoryServerConfiguration.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      DirectoryServerRule directoryServerRule
      The rule being tested.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestDirectoryServerRuleMethodConfiguration() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void canLoadFromClasspath()
      Verify the that the rule will seed the server with LDAP directory entries when the ldifFile parameter of the annotation is specified.
      void canLoadFromFilesystem()
      Verify the that the rule will seed the server with LDAP directory entries when the ldifFile parameter of the annotation is specified.
      void checkServerIsNotRunning()
      Verify that the rule does not start server when the test method is not annotated with DirectoryServerConfiguration.
      void checkServerIsRunning()
      Verify that the rule starts a server when the test method is annotated with DirectoryServerConfiguration.

      • directoryServerRule

        public DirectoryServerRule directoryServerRule
        The rule being tested.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestDirectoryServerRuleMethodConfiguration

        public TestDirectoryServerRuleMethodConfiguration()

    • Method Detail

      • checkServerIsRunning

        public void checkServerIsRunning()
        Verify that the rule starts a server when the test method is annotated with DirectoryServerConfiguration.

      • checkServerIsNotRunning

        public void checkServerIsNotRunning()
        Verify that the rule does not start server when the test method is not annotated with DirectoryServerConfiguration.

      • canLoadFromClasspath

        public void canLoadFromClasspath()
        Verify the that the rule will seed the server with LDAP directory entries when the ldifFile parameter of the annotation is specified. This variation loads the LDIF file as a classpath resource.

      • canLoadFromFilesystem

        public void canLoadFromFilesystem()
        Verify the that the rule will seed the server with LDAP directory entries when the ldifFile parameter of the annotation is specified. This variation loads the LDIF file using a file system path.
